title: Mord ult should be dodgable,
body: Like urgot, or any other ''balanced'' champ, we should be able to dodge his ult.. thats all i ask.

replies.body: You can QSS his ult. It is not meant to be dodgeable
yes, exactly, and thats exactly what i dont like, it should be dodgable. for such a op ult. just making it point and click is very stupid.
It is.  Walk into a bush as he casts it BAM its on CD.  Play smarter and complain less about champs that offer actual counterplay.
QSS, it can be wind walled apparently, his ult is stopped by a lot of things
You can see it, and "dodge" it with any untargetable/invisibility effect.
Can't Dodge Zed's or yasuo's or Twitch's, or Garen's, or ahri's or cait's, or Diana's, or... You get the idea.

Zed can be hour glassed negating full ult, Twitch you can outrun, Ahri...that was a joke right? Cait can be blocked by someone else, Diana has to be close and even fed a lot of time if she doesn't land the Q to make it recast-able, it's not that strong, Yas is requires SOMETHING to knock you up. And Garen is the easiest champ in LoL and should be deleted. Lmao.
Point is MOST ults that can't be dodged don't guarantee you a kill. Trundle doesn't confirm a kill, you just run away. Syndra and Veigar both have delete button ults but can be timed with Hourglass to miss. Nocturne is tricky but also can be hourglassed or you just move to a bush/somewhere he can't see you during his ult. Camille is the closest thing IMO to a busted ult that just wins. However, at least with hers I think (I could be wrong honestly because I don't play her) but I THINK, others can still damage her while she traps someone. If so, hers isn't even that bad. With Mord...he wins. Unless he's braindead and grabs someone FAR stronger than him..he just wins.
If they make it dodgeable then they need to remove the QSS interaction.
Morde's ult is dodge-able, if you build a QSS.
